metadata.description: Spells that transform and alter fire, heat, and light

spells.name: Transform Fire to Ice
spells.description: Transforms existing fire into freezing ice, instantly extinguishing flames while creating bitter cold that can freeze nearby water.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (transform fire to opposite), +2 Voice, +1 Aquam requisite

spells.name: Cold Fire
spells.description: Transforms fire to burn without heat, creating eerie flames that provide light but no warmth and cannot ignite combustible materials.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (remove heat from fire), +1 Touch, +2 Sun

spells.name: Invisible Flame
spells.description: Transforms fire to burn invisibly while retaining all its heat and destructive properties. The flame cannot be seen but can still burn.

spells.name: Transform Heat to Light
spells.description: Converts thermal energy into brilliant illumination, creating bright light from heat sources without reducing their temperature.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (convert heat to light), +1 Touch, +2 Sun

spells.name: Flames of Many Colors
spells.description: Changes the color of flames to any desired hue or pattern, creating spectacular displays while maintaining the fire's normal properties.

spells.name: Breath of Flame
spells.description: Transforms the caster's breath into fire, allowing them to exhale flames like a dragon for as long as they concentrate.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (transform breath to fire), +0 Personal, +1 Concentration, +1 Auram requisite

spells.name: Consuming Darkness
spells.description: Transforms light into consuming darkness that actively devours illumination, creating an area of absolute blackness.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (transform light to darkness), +2 Voice, +1 Diameter, +2 Room, +1 Perdo requisite

spells.name: Molten Metal Touch
spells.description: Transforms the heat in the caster's hands to melt metal on contact, allowing them to shape iron and steel with their bare hands.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (intense heat transformation), +0 Personal, +2 Sun, +1 Terram requisite

spells.name: Purifying Flames
spells.description: Transforms fire into purifying flames that burn away disease, poison, and corruption while leaving healthy tissue unharmed.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (transform fire properties), +1 Touch, +1 Concentration, +1 Creo requisite

spells.name: Liquid Fire
spells.description: Transforms fire into a flowing liquid that retains its burning properties, creating streams of flame that can be poured or directed.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (change fire state), +2 Voice, +1 Diameter, +1 Aquam requisite
